name: tabmailer
description: An extension that saves tabs youve been hoarding and randomly emails them to you

scripts.test: export DATASTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8081 && $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && LOG_LEVEL=warn&& NODE_ENV=development&& LIVE_EMAIL=false&& jest
scripts.startdev: ttab -G -t 'Datastore Emulator' gcloud beta emulators datastore start && export DATASTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8081 && $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ignore 'logs/*' --ignore 'pages/*' server.js
scripts.debug: ttab -w -t 'Datastore Emulator' gcloud beta emulators datastore start && export DATASTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8081 && $(gcloud beta emulators datastore env-init) && NODE_ENV=development nodemon  --inspect --ignore 'logs/*' --ignore 'pages/*' server.js

author: Dan Golant
